cab.content: S E C R E T .OPERATIONS .Prom:- General Delirie Radcliffe,- Italy. To:- C.I.G.S., War Office.Received 5.30 a.m. 16%12.1917.10045.December 15th. There was comparative quiet along the whole front where some enemy pressure was maintained towards Monte Asolone until relieved in the afternoon by an Italian counter-attack. There was considerable aerial activity along the front especially on 3rd Army front. Three hostile aeroplanes were brought down.
